entry.title: amish-kumar-07/Amish_Kumar: Simple Portfolio Website is a modern, responsive web application featuring a contact form built using React, Tailwind CSS, and EmailJS. This project enables users to send messages directly via email without needing a backend server, making it an ideal solution for portfolios, personal websites, or lightweight business pages.
entry.content: Simple Portfolio Website is a modern, responsive web application featuring a contact form built using React, Tailwind CSS, and EmailJS. This project enables users to send messages directly via email without needing a backend server, making it an ideal solution for portfolios, personal websites, or lightweight business pages.

entry.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: xyaman/lumi-reader: Epub reader focused in Japanese books. Aiming to be fast and lightweight.
entry.content: Epub reader focused in Japanese books. Aiming to be fast and lightweight.

entry.title: SeloSlav/vibe-coding-starter-pack-2d-multiplayer-survival: A lightweight 2D open-world survival game starter kit using React, Vite, and SpacetimeDB. Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 2D open-world survival game starter kit using React, Vite, and SpacetimeDB. Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.

entry.title: drubiodev/LadrillosJS: A lightweight, zero-dependency web component framework for building modular web applications.

entry.title: sohantalukder/rn-phone-input-field: A React Native phone number input component with country code selection, formatting, and validation, built from scratch without external libraries. Customizable, lightweight, and user-friendly.
entry.content: A React Native phone number input component with country code selection, formatting, and validation, built from scratch without external libraries. Customizable, lightweight, and user-friendly.

entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: maccooper/polygon-map: A lightweight React app that explores a common UX flaw in location-based platforms like Facebook Marketplace and Tinder — the overuse of circular distance filters.
entry.content: A lightweight React app that explores a common UX flaw in location-based platforms like Facebook Marketplace and Tinder — the overuse of circular distance filters.

entry.title: graphql-hive/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

entry.title: bigalorm/bigal: A fast, lightweight ORM for PostgreSQL and node.js, written in Typescript.
entry.content: A fast, lightweight ORM for PostgreSQL and node.js, written in Typescript.

entry.title: chukwunonsoprosper/cryptia: CryptiaJS is a lightweight and secure JavaScript library for encrypting and decrypting text using a substitution cipher. Whether you're safeguarding sensitive data in web applications or adding encryption to your server-side projects, CryptiaJS is designed to be fast, reliable, and easy to use. ⚡
entry.content: CryptiaJS is a lightweight and secure JavaScript library for encrypting and decrypting text using a substitution cipher. Whether you're safeguarding sensitive data in web applications or adding encryption to your server-side projects, CryptiaJS is designed to be fast, reliable, and easy to use. ⚡

entry.title: irvanherz/entityorm: EntityORM is a lightweight TypeScript ORM inspired by Entity Framework, enabling expressive, array-like database queries with real JavaScript syntax — powered by Acorn and PostgreSQL.
entry.content: EntityORM is a lightweight TypeScript ORM inspired by Entity Framework, enabling expressive, array-like database queries with real JavaScript syntax — powered by Acorn and PostgreSQL.
